sentences.sContent: To do this we must reorientate training for mental health specialists, ring-fence time for these activities in job contracts, and provide incentives for community engagement.
sentences.sContent_eng: To do this we must reorientate training for mental health specialists, ring-fence time for these activities in job contracts, and provide incentives for community engagement.
sentences.sCn: 要做到这点，我们必须重新定位心理卫生专业人士的培训，在就业合同中反复强调这些事项，并为这一共同约定提供激励措施。

sentences.sContent: So in order to develop private economy better, we must reorientate to the government's function, this paper has carried on the discussion on the issue.
sentences.sContent_eng: So in order to develop private economy better, we must reorientate to the government's function, this paper has carried on the discussion on the issue.
sentences.sCn: 因此为了更好的发展民营经济，我们必须对政府的职能进行重新定位，本文就针对这一问题进行了探讨。

sentences.sContent: With nearly 3 years passing by I have to reorientate my future.
sentences.sContent_eng: With nearly 3 years passing by I have to reorientate my future.
sentences.sCn: 转眼快3年过去了，我要重新确定我未来的方向。
